snippet.title: Deep Scan - (1979) - Arcade - gameplay
snippet.description:
Deep Scan
Sega © 1979 
[Coin-Op] Arcade Video Game
Emulator:  Mame 1.91

 I have no idea why they named it this, other than its a French import.  OUI? This is like a slightly faster playing, but far more boring version of the Sub Hunt game from a couple years back (look at that, I'm so bored I don't even want to go lookup what the game was called - but it's not Sea Wolf).  Fire your depth charges (Depth Charge, I think was the name the other game) and try to hit the subs passing underneath your boat.  These subs are like pack animals - they swarm in huge groups.  And, like always, almost impossible to time a shot to hit the deepest subs.  You're best off just dropping charges like you're the mad bomber and hope you hit as much as possible.  I was so glad the game finally ended: 1890 pts
